Key Match Events: Mayank Yadav took 1 wicket in his debut match
Bangladesh lost 7 wickets in the last 4 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Shrimant Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium, Gwalior
Others: India won the match by 7 wickets
The 2nd T20I will be played on 9th October, Wednesday in New Delhi
